actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide that the changes made by the Tax Reform Act of 1976 to the exclusion for sick pay shall only apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 1977.

summary.text: Amends the Tax Reform Act of 1976 to delay its provisions affecting the exclusion of sick pay until taxable years beginning after December 31, 1977.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the changes made by the Tax Reform Act of 1976 to the exclusion for sick pay shall only apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 1977.
